ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Troll SK - Looking for Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: When I dinged level 11 the game sent me an email saying I could hunt in blackburrow. If you can actually make it to blackburrow safely it wasn t so bad from
ygData.messageBody:
When I dinged level 11 the game sent me an email saying I could hunt in blackburrow. If you can actually make it to blackburrow safely it wasn't so bad from what I recall.
Another spot is East Commons. Hunting the lions, bears, and orcs. then you can move to west commons for the dervs and higher level bears. Just don't attack any near the druid ring.. oh wait.. just dont' go near the druid ring. Killing the deathfist orcs gets you faction with freeport so it's good to do that.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-17, 15:29:00 you wrote: =======

>Hell All
>
>New to the group so I thought I would drop in and say hello. I played
>EQ some time ago, six or seven years and it's changed quite a bit to
>say the least. I do like the Tutorial, which allowed me to create a
>character and get him to 10-11th level in no time at all. Now being
>12th level, I play a Troll SK, what's a good place to hunt. I group
>when I can but the servers not always busy. Looking for good xp and
>coin of course. Figured Befallen or the Lava fields.
>
>Thanks to all
>
>Scott
>
